evidence_example.title: Demo USART
evidence_example.small_descr: This is a basic demo showing the use of the USART port.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This example describes how to use the USART port to exchange data bytes through an Hyperterminal.

This implementation output a message on the Hyperterminal using USART6. Moreover, any character received from the Hyperterminal is sent back.
